block.p: Manhattan
GRAMERCY PARK

$859,000 50 Lexington Avenue (24th Street) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 900-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; dining area, renovated kitchen and baths, 2 exposures; terrace; common roof deck, gym and pool in building; maintenance $1,531, 50% tax deductible; listed at $859,000, 8 weeks on market (brokers: Bellmarc Realty; Arkar)

WEST MIDTOWN $999,500 347 West 57th Street (Colonnade) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen; laundry and gym in building; common charge $729; taxes $8,400; listed at $1.095 million, 32 weeks on market (broker: Bellmarc Realty)
WEST SIDE

$775,000 2025 Broadway (69th Street) (Nevada) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 950-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; renovated kitchen, new windows, east exposure; maintenance $2,400, 66% tax deductible; listed at $849,000, 39 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

UPPER WEST SIDE $1.375 million 90 Riverside Drive (81st Street) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,400-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; gym in building; maintenance $1,436, 40% tax deductible; listed at $1.345 million (pre-emptive bid), 12 weeks on market (brokers: Klara Madlin Real Estate; Halstead Property)
INWOOD

$345,000 1793 Riverside Drive (Henshaw Street) 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 910-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; renovated eat-in kitchen, high ceilings, hardwood floors, south exposure; laundry in building; maintenance $652, 52% tax deductible; listed at $345,000, 1 week on market (broker: Edel Family Management)
Bronx

RIVERDALE $630,000 245 West 261st Street 5-bedroom, 2-bath, 70-year-old detached wood-frame house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, living room with fireplace, full basement; rear porch; 25-by-87-ft. lot; taxes $3,500; listed at $650,000, 8 weeks on market (brokers: Ardor Real Estate; Susan E. Goldy)
Brooklyn
PARK SLOPE

$410,000 164 Sterling Place 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 600-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; renovated kitchen and bath, high ceilings, hardwood floors, south exposure; common garden; maintenance $288, 30% tax deductible; listed at $410,000, 1 week on market (broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)
WINDSOR TERRACE

$865,000 543 16th Street (Park West) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,211-sq.-ft. condo in a newly constructed building; dining area, kitchen with granite breakfast bar and stainless steel appliances, marble baths, cherry wood floors, home office, whirlpool bath, 2 exposures; balcony; common charge $290; taxes $1,488 (abated); listed at $889,000, 8 weeks on market (broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)
Queens

FOREST HILLS $314,000 104-20 68th Drive 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; elevator, dining area, eat-in kitchen, living room, hardwood floors; maintenance $644, 50% tax deductible; listed at $325,000, 5 weeks on market (broker: Century 21 Benjamin)
Staten Island

GRYMES HILL $665,000 169 Highland Avenue 4-bedroom, 4-bath, 52-year-old detached colonial-style house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, fireplace, hardwood floors, finished basement; 1-car garage; 60-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,545; listed at $919,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Weichert/Vitale Sunshine)
Hawaii
MILILANI

$605,000 94334 Hokulii Place 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 29-year-old 1-story stucco-sided house; rear deck with whirlpool; 2-car garage; 0.15-acre lot; taxes $1,908; listed at $619,000, 17 weeks on market (broker: Century 21 Aloha Properties)
HONOLULU

$280,000 221 Ala Wai Boulevard (Aloha Lani) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 413-sq.-ft. condo in a 31-year-old high-rise building; elevator, dining area, wall-to-wall carpets, high floor, mountain views; pool, sauna and exercise room in complex; common charge $228, includes parking space; taxes $768; listed at $289,000, 7 weeks on market (brokers: Summit Properties of Hawaii; Prudential Advantage Realty)

HONOLULU $480,000 2440 Kuhio Avenue (Waikiki Park Heights) 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,096-sq.-ft. condo in a 33-year-old high-rise building; two lanais, ocean view; common charge $789; taxes $1,968; listed at $499,000, 11 weeks on market (broker: Century 21 Aloha Properties)

HONOLULU $1.05 million 1334 Seventh Avenue 6-bedroom, 4-bath, recently constructed 2-story stucco-sided house; family room with wet bar, laundry room, open lanai; balcony, 2-car garage; 0.10-acre lot; taxes not yet assessed; listed at $1.08 million, 1 week on market (brokers: Loyal Realty; Prudential Advantage Realty)

HONOLULU $2.6 million 5305 Kahalakua Street 4-bedroom, 3-bath, newly constructed 2-story stucco-sided house in a private gated community; dining area, eat-in kitchen, family room, exercise room; hardwood, marble and granite floors; ocean view from every room; pool, 3-car garage; 1/2-acre lot; taxes $6,300; listed at $2.7 million, 13 weeks on market (brokers: Prudential Advantage Realty; Gold Coast Real Estate)
HONOLULU

$1.4 million 1715 Hunnewell Street 5-bedroom, 4-bath, 1-year-old 2-story stucco-sided house; dining room, eat-in kitchen with breakfast nook, open lanai, wet bar; 4-car garage; 0.14-acre lot; taxes $2,460; listed at $1.525 million, 10 weeks on market (brokers: Summie Li, Realtors; Century 21 Aloha Properties)
Manhattan
